email_text:
Dear [Passenger Name],

Thank you for choosing Delta Air Lines for your upcoming trip. Below is your itinerary confirmation:

Flight Details:
- Flight 1: Delta Flight DL1234
  - Departure: New York (JFK) on October 15, 2023 at 7:00 AM
  - Arrival: Los Angeles (LAX) on October 15, 2023 at 10:00 AM

- Flight 2: Delta Flight DL5678
  - Departure: Los Angeles (LAX) on October 20, 2023 at 2:00 PM
  - Arrival: New York (JFK) on October 20, 2023 at 10:00 PM

Please check-in for your flight using the following link: https://www.delta.com/checkin

If you have any questions or need assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us at 1-800-123-4567. 

We look forward to welcoming you on board. Have a safe and pleasant journey!

Sincerely,
Delta Air Lines
